嬿字的基本解释

嬿
yàn
美好：“嬿服而御。”
〔嬿婉〕ａ．美好，如“嬿嬿如春。”ｂ．美好的人，特指美女，如“置酒携嬿嬿。”
安乐：“崇曲房之嬿也。”

嬿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於甸切，去霰，影。］
［《廣韻》於殄切，上銑，影。］
亦作“嬊1”。
(1)美好。参见“嬿婉”。
(2)安乐；安闲。

嬿字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬿； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页273第38
【廣韻】【集韻】?伊甸切，音晏。美也。　又【集韻】於殄切，音蝘。嬿婉，安順貌。　又因連切，音烟。女字。通作燕。

嬿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嬿字的起名意思

：安乐，安闲；美好的人，特指美女。

Ying
Basic explanation of words
Ying
yàn
Beautiful: "Being subdued and imperial."
[嬿婉] a. Beautiful, such as "safety like spring." b. A beautiful person, especially a beautiful woman, such as "buying a wine and carrying a beautiful woman."
An Le: "Chongqufang is the perfect one."
Ying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" Yu Dian cut, go to hail, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" is cut, milled, and shadowed. ]
Also known as "嬊1".
(1) Beautiful. See "嬿wan".
(2) Ease; Ease.
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬿; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 273-38
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Eden cut, Yin Yan. Beauty too.　[Jiyun] Yu Yuqie, Yinpai. Yan Wan, Anshun looks.　Because of continuous cutting, sound smoke. Female characters. Tong Zuo Yan.
